channel.title: ScutterCast MP3 Edition
channel.description: An MP3 only podcast, reviewing past and present episodes of Red Dwarf, with some speculation of future episodes. Also we discuss current Red Dwarf news and rumour in the GrooveTown section, and finish off with a general chit chat in the Parrots Bar.
channel.itunes:author: Red Dwarf Forum
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Unofficial Red Dwarf Forum

item.title: ScutterCast | Dimension Jump XVI
item.description:
A special episode for you listening pleasure.

Fi (Eccentricast and EccentriWHO host) attended this years Dimension Jump and was good enough to send us a 15 minute sound clip of her reactions from the event.

We thought it only fair to share this with you.

Enjoy…
item.content:encoded:
A special episode for you listening pleasure.

Fi (Eccentricast and EccentriWHO host) attended this years Dimension Jump and was good enough to send us a 15 minute sound clip of her reactions from the event.

We thought it only fair to share this with you.

Enjoy

item.title: ScutterCast | Episode 06 | Me2
item.description:
This is the 6th instalment of many ScutterCasts, to bring you reviews of old, and new Red Dwarf episodes.

Discussing everything Red Dwarf and Sci-Fi related, not forgetting the main website of http://www.reddwarfforum.com.

This episode we review is “Me2″, we also discuss the Red Dwarf “Back to Earth” DVD, and just a general chinwag about everything Sci-Fi.

If you would like to email in any comments on the episodes, please email to scuttercast@reddwarfforum.com, or feel free to follow us on twitter

This episode is hosted by Darren, Nik, Antony and Andy

This is the last one of series 1, we are talking a short series break, and will be back with you in a couple of weeks with the episode Kryten

Any queries about the ScutterCast, please feel free to read the FAQ’s

edit: We’ve been made aware, that the Novo Babylonia advert is missing, as this is only 20 seconds long, we’ve going to leave it as is, apologies for the inconvenience…
